titleStmt.title: Several letters and passages between His Excellency, the Lord General Cromwel and the governor of Edinburgh Castle, and the ministers there, since His Excellencies entrance into Edinburgh. Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field for Francis Tyton, at the Three Daggers near the Inner Temple- Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of the originals in the University of Illinois Library and in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Three Daggers near the Inner Temple- Gate
